category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionOccGroupShownColumnWidthsPref
preference.preference_description: Defines the width of the columns displayed in the partitions tab of the plant BOP, as defined by the Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionOccGroupDisplayNameColumnsShownPref preference. This setting affects each column defined in the Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionOccGroupDisplayNameColumnsShownPref preference. Valid Values: Accepts one or more integers as values. The number of integers should match the number of columns in the Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionOccGroupDisplayNameColumnsShownPref preference.
